Articles.Content:
So I noticed a new file has appeared in my Ships folder. It contains the normal ships in the SPH but the Searwing is not included. I am a bit confused by it. I have no idea how it got there though. I will test it shortly.

EDIT: I have discovered it is in fact part of the stock game (I renamed the Ships file and verified the files with steam, and the oldSPH file appears in the new Ships folder).

Edited October 13, 2014 by mike9606
